overview:
Scott C. Petersen is the Chairman and CEO of LodgeNet Interactive Corporation (NASD: LNET). Mr. Petersen joined the company in 1987 as Senior Vice President for Corporate and Legal Affairs. As its 11th employee, Mr. Petersen has been a driving force in the companyâ€™s impressive growth. LodgeNet is now the world leader in delivering entertainment content and interactive experiences to more than 1.9 million interactive hotel rooms, and serves 10,000 hotel properties worldwide as well as many leading healthcare facilities.

Mr. Petersen was named Executive Vice President and Chief Operating Officer in 1991 and guided the Company through its IPO in 1993. Promoted to President & CEO in 1998, Mr. Petersen was named as the company’s Chairman of the Board in October 2000. Prior to 1987, Mr. Petersen was in a private legal practice specializing in corporate law and real estate development and syndication.
